en-US.summary: Put your arithmetic skills to the test, with three levels, basic, intermediate, and advanced!
en-US.name: Quick Math
en-US.description:
Put your arithmetic skills to the test, with three levels, basic, intermediate, and advanced! To start, just say "Alexa, launch Quick Arithmetic" or "Alexa, open Quick Arithmetic" to start the game".

At anytime, you can stop the game by saying "Alexa, stop"
